channel.title: Events and Activities on Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society
channel.description: Recent content in Events and Activities on Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society

item.title: Cardiff Microwave Roundtable
item.author: officers@cardiffars.org.uk (Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society)
item.description: About Program Dinner Venue Attendees Register Attendee List We look forward to seeing everyone at the event.

item.title: Cardiff Microwave Roundtable
item.author: officers@cardiffars.org.uk (Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society)
item.description: About Program Dinner Venue Attendees Register Dinner There was a group dinner in the evening from 18:30 to 21:00 at Valentino’s, a nearby Italian restaurant within easy walking distance of the main venue.

item.title: Cardiff Microwave Roundtable
item.author: officers@cardiffars.org.uk (Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society)
item.description: About Program Dinner Venue Attendees Register CUARS hosted a meeting of the UK Microwave Group on Saturday March 16, 2019 at our campus in Cardiff.

item.title: Cardiff Microwave Roundtable
item.author: officers@cardiffars.org.uk (Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society)
item.description: About Program Dinner Venue Attendees Register March 16, 2019 Time Event Description 9:30 Doors open 10:30 Welcome 10:40 Talk 1 Amateur Television on the Microwave Bands 11:15 Talk 2 RF Power Amplifier Design Considerations 11:50 Break Measurements, project demos, etc 12:30 Lunch Buffet at the University 13:30 Talk 3 Amateur Optical Communications 14:05 Talk 4 Advanced High Efficiency PAs 14:40 Break 15:20 Talk 5 Microwave Moonbounce Communication 15:55 Talk 6 Digital Pre-Distortion 16:30 Closing remarks ~5 minutes 17:00 Venue Closes Moving to a pub until dinner 18:30 - 21:00 Dinner Breaks The ENGIN Forum was open all day and had refreshments during breaks.

item.title: Cardiff Microwave Roundtable
item.author: officers@cardiffars.org.uk (Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society)
item.description: About Program Dinner Venue Attendees Register Registration Pre-registration was required and the event cost Â£10 to cover food and refreshments.

item.title: Cardiff Microwave Roundtable
item.author: officers@cardiffars.org.uk (Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society)
item.description: About Program Dinner Venue Attendees Register Venue The Roundtable was held in the West and South Queen’s Buildings of Cardiff University’s engineering department.

item.title: Radio Direction Finding Event
item.author: officers@cardiffars.org.uk (Cardiff University Amateur Radio Society)
item.description: Wednesday February 13, 2019 3 PM - 4:30 PM We ran a hidden transmitter hunt, also known as an Amateur Radio Direction Finding event.
